content: Any objections to me starting the trend of making a "feature" label for lints? The example I'm thinking of for now is #44752 (single_use_lifetimes). I'm thinking either F-lint-single_use_lifetimes or L-single_use_lifetimes
There a few issues that would get tagged for this: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+single_use_lifetimes
Unless anyone objects in the next 10ish minutes, I'll probably just make F-lint-single_use_lifetimes. Labels are easy to rename or delete and I'm currently actually able to do some work here.
so the idea is to tag things that would be resolved if that lint were implemented and deployed (as either warn- or deny-by-default) ?
Yes, I think so. I guess it only makes sense when there are multiple related issues.
